wizard.name: Living Example (Java)
wizard.description:
Creates a project containing a simple Java model and some OCL constraints.
This example can be used for OCL parsing and SQL code generation.

wizard.name: SEPA/Pain Example (XML)
wizard.description:
Creates a project containing an XML Schema as a model and three different instances of this XML Schema that can be used for OCL interpretation of contained OCL constraints.
Constraints and Model are kindly provided by Nomos Software (http://www.nomos-software.com/)

wizard.name: PML Example (Ecore)
wizard.description: Creates a project containing an EMF Ecore model and different Ecore instances that can be used for OCL interpretation of contained OCL constraints.

wizard.name: Royal and Loyal Example (UML/Java)
wizard.description:
Creates a project containing the well-known Royal & Loyal UML model from Warmer & Kleppe, some OCL constraints and a Java model instance.
This example can be used for OCL interpretation.

wizard.name: Simple Example (UML/Java)
wizard.description:
Creates a project containing a simple UML/Java model, some OCL constraints and a simple Java model instance.
This example can be used for OCL interpretation.

wizard.name: University Example (UML)
wizard.description:
Creates a project containing a simple UML model and some OCL constraints.
This example can be used for OCL parsing and SQL code generation.
